featured.text: It is believed that the martial art was connected with tribal fighting in Africa, in which people fought body to body, without weapons, in order to acquire a bride or desired woman.
He succeeded in his endeavor and transformed the martial art into Brazil’s national sport.

definition.zh_def: 與戰爭或戰鬥有關的；軍事的
definition.en_def: Relating to war or the armed forces.
definition.example: He trained in martial arts to improve his self-defense skills.
